onna karunu tika. 1.mahiyanganayata yakshayan raus wuye budu bana asimatayi. 2.dewani siyawasedi aandigala kanda mudune niyatha parimawata, lankawe hadayata, diya pokunak saduwe guwane sita kala manimwalinda? 3.buduhimiyo animisa lochana pujawa pawathwuye wishwa shakthiya aaropanaya kara ganimatayi. 4.ashoka rajuta wideshadhara yawa ape dewanampiyathissa raju indiyawe sankethathmakawa raja wuyeya.(meya 2009 di kalani wishwawidyalaye pawath wu anthar jathika samupawakatada idiripath keruwemi. 5.sanghamiththa theraniya samaga atalos kulayak aawe apa rajugen labu shishathwayakatayi.(meya oppu kota maha sinhale wansakathawedi ape ellawala medhananda hamuduruwan pawa asarana keruwemi.* 6.kuweniyawa maruwe wijayayi. 7.wijaya eddi kuweniya atha dura daknayak thibuneda?(mahacharya sunanda mahenda්ra meya daka ape ratin kpiyopatra yugayedi magnifayi kannadi yawa thibena bawa pawasuweya* 8.rawana raja ajatakasha yana yawwe samanala kandenda? 9.sahathika washayenma kalaniyata sunamiyak aawe natha.(me pilibadawa da puwathpathwalata lipi sapayini. 10.rakshana aawaranayak sahitha lowa palamu naukawa padawuye dewi kumariyayi. 11.lowa palamu sagnya paniwidaya yawwe kawanthissa rajuyi.
